attributes.action: Sort out the Refuse collection issues relating to the strike
attributes.additional_details: Local authorities can't seem to sort this so it needs to go higher. The refuse collectors have rights and its the job of the council to protect the jobs. Not spend money where its not needed but on jobs that are needed. People need their bins collecting as eventually it will become a environmental issue
attributes.background: Thurrock refuse collectors have gone on strike since 13th April, they will not be collecting bins until 28th May. People are paying for a service which they are not getting. Protect the refuse collectors salaries and sort the mess out

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.thurrock.gov.uk/petitions/online-petitions
